#summary The ASM Java bytecode enginnering library.

= Introduction =

`The ASM Java bytecode engineering library can be used easily from GroovyLab. We present some examples.


== Example 1: Generating an interface =


{{{

import org.objectweb.asm.*
import static org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes.*


cw = new ClassWriter(0)

cw.visit(V1_5, ACC_PUBLIC+ACC_ABSTRACT + ACC_INTERFACE, 
  "pkg/Comparable", null, "java/lang/Object", [ "pkg/Measurable"] as String[] )

cw.visitField(ACC_PUBLIC + ACC_FINAL + ACC_STATIC, "LESS", "I",
  null, new Integer(-1)).visitEnd()

    
cw.visitField(ACC_PUBLIC + ACC_FINAL + ACC_STATIC, "EQUAL", "I",
  null, new Integer(0)).visitEnd()


cw.visitField(ACC_PUBLIC + ACC_FINAL + ACC_STATIC, "GRe", "I",
  null, new Integer(1)).visitEnd()

cw.visitMethod(ACC_PUBLIC + ACC_ABSTRACT, "compareTo", 
"(Ljava/lang/Object;)I", null, null).visitEnd();

cw.visitEnd()

b = cw.toByteArray()

    
}}}
